website_summaries.verdict: Very soft and comfortable flag pattern pants, great for lounging, yoga wear, or celebrating the Fourth of July.
pros: Comfortable for a cool summer night
cons: Note the sizing chart on these pants

customer_reviews.title: Very forgiving of your body shape is weird. Nice pants.
customer_reviews.text: great pants. Very flowy and soft, super comfy for cool summer night. I’m planning to wear these around the house and do yoga. I think it’s also great as a beach cover up for my summer vacation. It’s very loose so it is very forgiving on size, I ordered large. I’m 150lb 5’8”
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Soft, and So Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I am 142 lbs and 5'9" I bought a Large for the length and I am not disappointed. I LOVE these pants!!! I want them in all colors. I encourage anyone who has these to tie the drawstring before washing them so that it does not come out in the wash. Additionally, you will want to wash it in cold to make sure it does not shrink. I always worry that my clothes will lose length after they are washed but these pants did not. Also, they are SO SOFT! I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! I am 5'6" 140lbs and ordered a small. I an recovering from a c-section and these pajama pants are a great fit in all areas you would want them to be! The waist band is ultra comfy and not at all a burden on my healing scar, but still tight enough to hold the pants up without pulling the drawstring really tight. I've washed them twice now & the color and quality has held up. Wish I could wear these everyday if pajamas were acceptable in public places ;)
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber feel, comfortable lounge pants, moderate quality
customer_reviews.text: Fabric has similar feel to eyeglasses wipes, soft and brushed. Does not feel like cotton. Tag says 85% polyester, 15% cotton. Size XL has an approximately 33" inseam. The pants run a bit long, but are lightweight and comfortable for sleeping. On the first attempt to rebalance the string tie lengths, I pulled on one and heard stitches ripping in the string. That said, it's a comfortable pair of lounge pants.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great pants!
customer_reviews.text: These are great pants! So comfortable, and the fit is just right. I plan on wearing them as lounge pants and even out with a cute matching top. The material is very flattering, too. I’m 5’4”, 130 lbs., and I ordered small. As you can see, I have the waist high right above my belly button because the top is rather long.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy(:
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an xlarge after reading the reviewd but would have been fine with a large. However i feel that after a wash or 2 they will shrink. The material is really nice, not nasty or see through as said in other comments. Even with black underwear im fine. They are REALLY long if you order an xlg. Im 5'7 and i have about 2 in left at the bottom. But more room to grow, which is a good thing(: very comfy! I feel these are flattering to my curves as well. Im 190 lbs and they hide the lil pudge well haha!
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Aoki

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured and they are a little see-through.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for maternity/postpartum pants. I am currently 36 weeks pregnant. I am giving a 4 star review because I ordered the grey and they are definitely more of a purple and not as pictured. They are also a little bit see-through so I wouldn’t recommend going commando in them. They are a semi silky light weight material which is super nice since it’s summer time. Based off all of the other reviews I read they are as I expected except the color and I would definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Caiti Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall women
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The feel is very soft and smooth. I am 6' tall with a 36" inseam and these pajama pants will reach all the way to the floor. I will try to update with a picture, but they are plenty long enough. I am 175 lbs and bought an XL. I could have gone a size smaller and it still fit in the waist, but I wanted to make sure I got the extra length so I sized up. Since they are pajamas I don't mind the loose fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "wearing nothing yet hides everything" pants
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of these type of lounge pants each from different manufacturers and all in the various styles as well, and I have to say these are one of my favorites. The Fabric is light and soft and falls nicely giving a very relaxing feel and allows for easy movement. I have not had to wash yet which is the best quality test in my opinion. They are adorable and comfortable, so as of now, I would say I received more than I expected for the money - I would say inexpensive versus cheap. If they wash well, I will be buying another pair to add to my already too extensive "Lazy-wear", I mean Lounge wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants and have two pairs and will order another!! You can wear them to bed or lounging around the house! Super comfy and cute., I ordered a large and they fit true to size except they are long on me I’m 5’3. Other than that they are true to size. I’d suggest ordering up if you want them lose around the waist. The pants fit lose other than a bit snug on the waste.
customer_reviews.author: ArtistPSW

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest pants! They aren’t the material I expected them to be, but I’m not mad about it. Very soft and perfect for lounging around the house. They are reallly long! I’m 5’2” so I’m used to having to take up pants, but these are long in the groin. It hangs halfway down my thighs. Instead of taking up the legs I’ll just lower the grey hip band. Too cute to return and an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: J Stin

customer_reviews.title: Length
customer_reviews.text: For reference I'm 5'2 about 180. I usually wear a 12-14. I bought a 3x the fit perfectly except they are SO LONG. I attached a picture of my jeans compared to the pants. As you can see there is a substantial length difference. I am wearing them as PJ/around the house pants so it is not that big of a deal. They are also pretty thin, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Cassey

customer_reviews.title: Loose and light
customer_reviews.text: I had to have abdominal surgery and wanted some loose comfy pants for hospital and recovery. Normally, I live in leggings so this was a step in the other direction. I chose these based on price mostly. They were very comfy, looked nice, and most importantly fit great. They are super loose and long and lightweight even for June in GA. I may have been better in a small at 127 lbs 5’7”, but wanted loose so got medium.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baker

customer_reviews.title: super cute & comfy!
customer_reviews.text: fits great, very comfy and very cute! Description says cotton & polyester, but it looks like a jersey knit in the picture - but it's more of a polyester printed to look like jersey (see close up pic in description) with the cotton keeping it soft & comfy. I just wanted anyone who's ordering to be aware that the "heather grey" color is printed on as much as the flowers are... however, don't let that deter you, they are super cute, and super comfy - I am thinking of ordering other colors. :)
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: These soft lounge pants are pretty and comfortable. I'm 5'4" 124 lbs. I bought the small and they fit well. The pants have a high rise, almost to my breast bone, where they hang a little loose. Worn with a sports bra, they're just the pants you've been looking for to hang around the house.
customer_reviews.author: AMFW

customer_reviews.title: Lounge pants for tall people!! Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9”, 170 and about 9weeks pregnant. 4 stars because I haven’t washed them yet so I don’t know how they will hold up but I do know they will be washed cold water on gentle. I’m excited because they are actually long!! There’s about 2” laying on the floor. The only thing that would make these 100% perfect is if they had pockets! They are thin, which I like, and aren’t see through. I knotted the drawstring so it won’t come out when I wash them. They’re stretchy enough that I will be able to wear them throughout my pregnancy yet snug enough to not fall off right now.
customer_reviews.author: Msph*

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Okay, but Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: So, I guess I was expecting something a little better since these were described in other reviews as “buttery soft.” I was hoping for something that’s... well... buttery soft? They’re not. They feel like plain old cheap “Walmart-Special” polyester pajama pants. Nothing spectacular. And not worth $15. I’d maybe give $6 for these on the clearance rack at TJ Maxx or Ross. The print is cute, but the material is definitely nothing to write home about. I mean, they’re not scratchy—they’re comfortable enough, I guess—but they’re certainly not especially soft. Like, if I came across these displayed in a store and touched them, I wouldn’t be like “ohhh, woooow, these are so soft!”
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Runs very big, but the pants are nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers are right, these run very big. Sadly they do not have an extra small or I would have exchanged them for a smaller size and hemmed the length. If you are very tall and have a hard time finding beautiful pants that fit your leg length then these are the pj’s for you! The material is very soft and the pattern is beautiful. For reference I am a 38 year old woman who is 5’4” and 110lb and I literally could not see my toes when I had these on.
customer_reviews.author: kim b

customer_reviews.title: Not what you expect!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered bigger because I wanted them to be baggier and more relaxed. THESE ARE NOT WHAT YOU EXPECT! The material is a SUPER cheap material. It is light weight and stretchy though, but clearly cheap. The blue and stars section of the flag pants is sewn in as a whole separate thing. You can feel where it is sewn and the fabric is all bunched up and it is very uncomfortable. The picture is nothing like what I received. These feel and look like something that would be in a dollar store. NOT at all worth the $15 spent.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Y

customer_reviews.title: Good long length, a bit loose
customer_reviews.text: These pants are basically what I hoped for, and that was long! I’m 5’8 and the small hit the floor comfortably. I’m not sure if they’ll keep the length after washing or not, but I’m planning on just hang drying them to be safe. The waist is drawstring but not very elastic; any looser and they would’ve been too large. The fabric is a bit slick and artificial as others have mentioned, but it is still soft and comfortable, and not too ‘plasticky’ in feel. Very lightweight, cute, slightly on the cheap side, but I was expecting that. Overall happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size smaller then usually
customer_reviews.text: These look cute in picture * the black and white stripes however I looked like a prison inmate as they look like jailhouse pants. Haha Although I won’t wear them outside my house, I do wear to bed as they’re extremely lightweight and comfortable! *WARNING- I wish I knew these was huge in sizing- if you want these pants to fit you how they should- then order 1 to 2 sizes smaller than your size! Also if you’re 5’3 or shorter a majority of the legs will touch the ground. Hope this review helps you lovely ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Renee

customer_reviews.title: Sizing, feel, comfort, fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 125 lbs, 5'7", long torso, therefore not long legs. These fit nice, but boy are they long. Like Popeye's Sweet Pea running around! So, since I like them and the feel of the fabric (great lounge palazo pants), I will him them with a 'casing', run some elastic through the casings at the hems, then all will be fine. If I order again, I'd order a size Small instead of Medium. But even then, they'd probably be way too long. Nice feel and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: debatina

customer_reviews.title: they feel great, but everyone said they ran small
customer_reviews.text: they feel great, but everyone said they ran small. I disagree, theyre like a foot too long and I have to use the drawstring or I cant keep them up. I ordered a small so its not like I could get them any smaller...
customer_reviews.author: Blaze Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Cute & long enough!! Recommend trying them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6ft tall and 145lbs, so I'm pretty slim. I got the large and it was LONG ENOUGH to graze the floor with me wearing around my hips! This is a rare occurrence for me, haha, so I'm really surprised and happy about that. They are SUPER cute (I got the gray polka dot ones) and really soft. The reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because they seem a little cheaply made (but I mean, they are cheap, so kind of what I expected) and I'm hoping they last, but I'm definitely keeping them!
customer_reviews.author: Ramani

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these pants! So comfy, very soft and lightweight. Bought 2 more pairs! Love that there is no elastic waist so it doesn’t cut into my love handles. The waistband material itself is kinda stretchy, so they don’t fall down even without the tie. Flattering and comfy = perfect lounge pants. Got compliments from several friends who stopped by about how super cute they were!
customer_reviews.author: Lori K

customer_reviews.title: Love! Comfy & Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Great casual pajamas to lounge around in. Bought these while in the hospital for a week during the pandemic, soft, comfy, and still using them as I am recouping from major surgery. I have washed more than 10 times and hasn't faded or do they shrink. Their nice enough to wear around company without most not thinking they are not PJ bottoms. I only suggest the string in the front, make sure you make larger knots so they will not fall out. Great price, love them, soft, great summer lounge PJ bottoms.. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: RhondaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Soft
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for the hospital after giving birth. They were perfect! I’m 5’3 and got a medium I pulled them up kinda high due to having a c section and not wanting them on my incision directly, and they still went under my feet. So they’re fairly long. But I got lots of compliments on them by the nurses lol
customer_reviews.author: macy Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality, Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: NOT good quality at all. They feel like something you would get from an app like Wish. The design is cute and looks like the picture, but the fabric is very thin and feels plastic-y. I would compare it to like one of those disposable table cloths you can get at the $1 store for parties. Save your money and go to Marshall’s or TJ Maxx for a bargain on lounge pants. Also very long for petite girls (I’m 5’3” and the pants went past my feet), but I don’t really mind that for lounge. It was the fabric quality that made me give a poor review.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Soft but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft and comfy, but also very thin. Good for the summer or those who get hot easily. I'm 5'2 and typically wear a medium or large; i ordered the large and they were over a foot too long, past my ankles! I returned and reordered a medium, still a bit long but i don't mind. The stitching is very sketchy; they are loose and not lined up correctly. I tied the string in a knot before i washed them but the string still came out completely. It seems more for decoration that to tighten the waist. Overall okay i guess, we'll see how long they last. I probably wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.author: Brie E.

customer_reviews.title: Size one size up, these are very long!
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for! I’m not upset about this item and I’ll be keeping it but I probably wouldn’t buy another pair. Cons- They are extra long, and I’m tallish. (5’7”) They keep sliding down? But they fit nicely I wouldn’t fit a size smaller. I’m glad I sized one size up. The material is more silky than comfy, but I don’t mind it. Pros- They are stretchy! They fit well, and are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davis

customer_reviews.title: Color Description is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the fit of these lounge pants. They are very comfortable and perfect for lounging while still being cute. My only issue is that the color is not accurate. I ordered grey/white stripe and the color is actually blue/white, which is not even a color option.
customer_reviews.author: L. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and inexpensive!!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AMAZING. So cute. So comfy. Not see through but thin and soft material. I’ve been wearing them after having my baby a week ago and I just love em. I just ordered another pair in the yellow!! And the price! Can’t beat this purchase. Great for a cooler spring day.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Winner!!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are my new favorite! They are soooo comfy. Love the length on them. They don’t shrink. I like long length on my pants. Can’t stand high waters. Hated buying pjs in the past have them fit perfect then after one wash then are Steve Erkle pants. These are holding up great through many washes. I went with a large. I’m 5 foot 8 inches and my weight can be about 135. The colors stay bright. Just so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: L Baker

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with these pants. I bought the xxl because it says us12. I usually wear a size 12 but I'm currently 9 months pregnant. These pants are huge! They are also long enough to fit my husband who is 6'5..I am only 5'4. I wanted to wear these after I give birth but there's no way I can. I should have noticed before, but now I've already washed them and thrown away the box they came in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Nash

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a VS Pink customer for 20yrs, they have not made anything this comfortable. I am having some health issues, gained 30lb in 3 months due to meds, very sensitive to whatever is touching me. These pants are perfect. Lightweight, breathable, soft, & cute. I bought 2 more pair after washing, wearing & washing again. They did fine on the hand wash cycle, dried quickly on drying rack. I went down a size on my 2nd order, I don’t think the Med will fit once I’m off the medication.
customer_reviews.author: Anna H

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good pajama pants, comfy material that is thinner so it doesn't make you hot. The string is just surged material though so it's quality is very low and when pulled too tight easily rips the threads. The string also comes out EVERY time I wash these pants. The pants were large for me. I usually wear a large so that's what I ordered but these are large in about every place possible for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Dominique Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Runs SUPER small!!
customer_reviews.text: When I went to purchase this product I checked the fit. It says fits true to size. I ordered XXL because I wear a 2x. Well in the description when it was in my cart I didn’t see that the XXL is actually only equal to a size 12. Let me tell you I honestly don’t even think someone who is a size 12 could wear these comfortably without them being tight. In my opinion they probably wouldn’t fit anyone above a 8 or 10. They were tiny! If you are a “thicker” girl don’t buy these!! Cause they aren’t made for us “thicker” women!
customer_reviews.author: Crishia

customer_reviews.title: Blue stripes not grey
customer_reviews.text: Perfect around the house pants. These are very comfortable and exactly what I wanted for my growing prego belly. I ordered a medium for that reason, pre-pregnancy I would have ordered a small. They are very long and the waist definitely has room. I ordered grey stripe and what I received is more a light blue. Picture against my grey bed sheets for reference. Not worth returning, though.
customer_reviews.author: CMF

customer_reviews.title: Way too big for a small
customer_reviews.text: First let me start by saying that I liked the floral pattern and fabric. However, I ordered a small which is the smallest size that was available and they are so long that even after washing and drying them they drag the ground. Not a good amount either, like a lot! Also, aound the waist even with tying the waistband, they are way too large. I normally wear a size 4 in jeans, so most smalls typically fit me. Very disappointed that they were so big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrives quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift so the fit and features are unknown at this time. My 'con' on the garment is...there is no washing tag or waistband tag or cardboard tag hanging on the garment at all!!!! How does the recipient know it is not something I've worn for months and am now giving it to her or how to wash it for that matter????? It would be nice to have something hanging on it that denotes it is new! I have few 'generic' tags I can use to attach with a small safety pin but it would be nice to have something from the actual manufacture attached to the garment from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: linda Brengle

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever made!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hands down the worst purchase I've ever made in my life!! These are like silk so the fabric is nice but they are way too big! The print is hideous! I could hang these on a pole in front of my house like a real flag they are so big! Waste of money big time. So I've cut them up to use as rags! Lol don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Mayes

customer_reviews.title: so comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I used the size chart but they are a little large for me. But people like them so much, and they are very soft. Great for pajamas or just kicking around the house. Pretty thin, so not super warm, but good beach cover ups. I like the stripes a lot. I got gray stripes, but when you look closely it's almost more of a pale lavender. You may want to size down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hull

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and pretty, though too long.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, too long really. The print I got was nice but the other pair I got was the light gray and it was see through so I exchanged for a darker pair. The rise is rather high but it’s fine. The inside of the fabric is white which is kind of weird and the drawstring is super long. But they appear to be good quality and I’m happy to have a nice looking pajama bottoms. I’m 5’5” and 155lbs and there’s a good inch on the floor in the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Jann Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love These...Will buy more!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’ 6” and 160#....I was looking for some comfortable lounge pants...These pants are perfect! The pants are long, but you can pull them up higher. I always have trouble finding pants that are long enough, so I like the extra length. There were some negative reviews about the waist string coming out when you wash them....I just tied some knots on the ends, or you can just make sure to have it tied before you throw them in the washer. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: pix

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pants!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these pants after having surgery on my stomach and they were so soft and comfortable not tight at all! The sizing on the pants are pretty accurate if you follow the chart in the pictures. They’re definitely my favorite lounge pants and I’ve went back and ordered more for myself in the other floral designs and have had the same excellent results!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Lounge Pants!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, thin and breathable, and lightweight. I sort of expected them to be a tad heavier but I’m still happy with them. The printing job seems kinda cheap but still pretty! They also fit great! Not sloppy or “frumpy“ so I can feel like I look okay but still be comfortable while hanging out at home. And the wide waistband is awesome. I’m a size 10 jean and the medium fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Great fit all around & look good on long legs!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are great! For about $15 and without trying them on, I was fully expecting to return them unsatisfied. They fit great - not too tight in the waist, not too loose on the butt, and cute, flowy legs! Super comfortable material too. I'm 5'8" and all legs so finding pants is always a challenge and I only have one pair of lounge pants that fit right. These work perfect for long legs and tall women! Highly recommend, I'll most likely be purchasing more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants. Very comfortable for lounging and wearing around the house. I ordered a bigger size to wear post partum and they fit great. I’m tall (5’8”) and usually have a hard time finding pants that are long enough, or that stay long even after washes, and these do! I ordered in a large and they fit great for around the house, but if I wanted to wear them out I probably would order a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these pjs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pjs. They are so comfortable. They are very long, I am 5'2 and they hang well past my feet, which I actually love because I hate pjs that turn into floods. I highly recoment these. They are draw string. I usually wear a size medium but the smalls fit me better. These are seriously amazing I have 2 pairs in different colors, and bought a pair for my mother. I am definitely planning on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Love these jammie pants
customer_reviews.text: I am a short, thick woman. These were unsurprisingly long on me, but I expect it and don’t sweat it on a PJ pant. I only wear these indoors. They’re super cute and my husband loves the booty shaking they give me the confidence to strut around with.
customer_reviews.author: Fliberty-jibet

customer_reviews.title: I love these pants!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants so much I bought another pair! I accidentally bought size small. My waist makes me look 7 months pregnant so I thought for sure these wouldn’t fit. But to my surprise they do fit well and are very comfortable. And the fabric is light weight. So I don’t overheat while wearing them. But to be honest it was the beautiful print that got me excited. I love roses and the ones on the pants are beautiful. The colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Long!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft pants and are great if you prefer a pj pant to be loose around your stomach. The only thing I disliked is the length of them! I wish they would of sold them in different lengths, but have the same size as you wanted. I am only 5 foot & the pants just drag on the floor! I do think they are a great style and that I do like the drawstring to adjust it to your waist size though.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Bukhari

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, passable as work wear if you really want to wear pjs to work.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Very VERY comfy. I will be ordering more. Sometimes I actually pass them off as work wear, so don't anybody go blabbing about "She's wearing PAJAMAS!" Paired with a plain t-shirt, I can pass them off as "NOT PAJMAS." No one has dared question me about compliance with dress code. I'm keeping my mouth shut!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan-a-mess

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 100%
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these. They are so comfortable. I was hesitant to get them because you never know. I am actually wearing them now. I ordered a size up thinking they may shrink. I was wrong. I am going to order my normal size. Make sure when you wash you tie the string, mine fell out so now I cant tie around my waist. I highly reccomend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy, Extra Long- what more could you want in lounge pants?!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pants to wear as pajamas during a Florida vacation with friends. I got the gray and yellow. The print is gorgeous, the fabric is super soft, they’re flowy and breathable, and they’re super long! I have long legs and finding pajama pants that are long enough is a challenge. I love these and am ordering more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: The Explorer

customer_reviews.title: You really won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with these pants. I’m 5’8 (long legs short torso) and i have such a hard time finding pants that drag the floor a bit. I like my pj pants to do that and usually have to shop men’s section to get that. These pants run a little big. I wear a size 12 and can fit in the large and honestly could wear a medium comfortably. I will 100% buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong- cozy, comfy jammy pants.
customer_reviews.text: Just lovely. Material is soft. The length is wonderful. I hate when you sleep and invariably your pant leg starts going up your calf. This never happens with these. The length is slightly longer than normal. Nevertheless giving you the perfect fit. The material is lightweight, yet not cheap or flimsy feeling. It is soft and so comfortable. I bought two pair, and absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Copsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but very long
customer_reviews.text: Nice lounge pants but they’re very long...by about 4 inches. I’m 5’7” with an average inseam (not sure exactly what it is) but I will be taking the pants in for alteration to the length. As I said, they are at least 4” too long. May not be as much of a problem on a very tall woman, but I’m guessing most anyone would need to have the length shortened.
customer_reviews.author: goldendoglover

customer_reviews.title: Returned, weird fabric
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this, it felt like really weird costume fabric. Like the kind you’d find on a cheap clown costume. It was very flimsy and seemed poorly made with threads everywhere. It was oddly shined too? Definitely not the type of pjs most pj pants are like.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis McInnis

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered the pant 3 times now. I love them!!I
customer_reviews.text: These are just awesome! I loved them so much I gave my daughter some and reordered for myself. They are so comfy!! I have worn them out and the get so many compliments!! I also wear them in the afternoon when I just want to be comfy!! Some pairs come in a bit too long, no problem roll them at the waist!! problem solved. I am in the process now to find different patters and solid ones!! I have become there walking advertiser!!1 Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen N

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pants!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are unbelievably soft. Seriously. I had read other reviews that said they were soft, but these pants exceeded my expectations! They were a bit long for me, so I had them hemmed—but I’m only 5’3”. I’m normally a size 14, and these pants were not too tight, not too loose—they’re just right. I love them for traveling because they’re super comfy, but also super cute! They’re the most comfortable pants ever!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Overall cute but not as soft as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The pants are overall cute. The material doesn't really feel like cotton but they are comfortable on your skin after washing. Be sure to tie the strings so they don't fall out. The material is very thin so if they were a lighter color you would be able to see through them. Cute design. Only wore them once so far but they are holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: I returned
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is cheap and not soft at all. I returned as the cut was all kinds of weird. Didn’t fit how lounge wear should and was some type of synthetic rayon. These are NOT cotton
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great lounge pants
customer_reviews.text: I am 153lbs/ 5'9", I got size large. Recommended size was medium. Im glad I got large. The length is perfect, they fit perfectly around my waist. I like my lounge pants to be a little baggier. They are soft and feel good against my skin, but they aren't cotton feeling at all. Still very comfy and will definitely get more.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaJean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for super comfortable bottoms to wear around the house during my pregnancy without looking frumpy. These pants are super cute and super comfortable! I bought 5 pairs in different patterns and they definitely don't disappoint! I got a size large so they'd fit to the end of my pregnancy and at 5 months, I have plenty of room. Pair them with a cute tank/cami and they're cute enough to wear out of the house! On a side note, they're very long if you're my height (5`3) but I just wear them around the house so it doesn't matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Not 12PM by Mon Ami
customer_reviews.text: The material is not what I expected and the crotch hangs low (long). Same style as my favorite comfy pants 12PM by Mon Ami (sold on Amazon) her pants are made in the USA and the material is so nice. These pants are from china. The material might be nice in warm weather since it's thin. I got a size large for length and they do tie so you can tighten the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute prints
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and adorable that I purchased 2 more in my expected post-baby size so I can wear them long after my recovery. I purchased these (1 pair in Large) specifically to wear home from the birth center and for the first few days of recovery. They are obviously kind of cheap but VERY cute and comfy - perfect for being home and having to wear pants when you'd really rather not lol... I may just purchase more as my size changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these pants so much. They are super comfy, very light thin soft material, and beautiful. My only issue with the pants is a personal issue I'm only 5'3" and they were really long on me. I have a tendency to trip on them. I find it best for me to just fold the top down on them to make them a little shorter. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but wish they were cotton.
customer_reviews.text: I am aware that these are a polyester pants, but I just wish they were something more breathable like cotton. That's really my only complaint. They are extremely comfortable and great for lounging around, but can get a little warm in your nether regions due to the material. I am 5' 5", 150 lbs, 32 inches in the waist, and 40 inches in the hips and the medium fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Way way too small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 2X and because lots of people said these run small I ordered the size 3X and they are small enough to fit my size 10 daughter, but super high rise on her and super long. She loves them for pajamas though so i will keep them. I don't know how so many people have ordered these and had them fit.
customer_reviews.author: momof5

customer_reviews.title: Way to long
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable BUT way to long. I’m 5’7 and I’m walking on 3 inches of pant leg which I cant stand. I can’t sew to save my life and the material is not the type you can roll. I’ve resorted to stuffing the leg bottoms into my shoes when I go outside so they don’t drag in the mud. It’s super annoying and an excessive amount of extra material.
customer_reviews.author: nerdrage

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, Not cotton!
customer_reviews.text: First off these are NOT cotton! Very comfortable blend of fabric. I’m 5’8” and around 155lbs and a large is the right size for me. Pant legs touch the floor for me where most pajama pants are high waters. Waist panel is a good 2” high and made of the same fabric as the pants. There is no elastic in the waist band just the tie and stretchable fabric. Personally I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, but needs a better waistband
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants, but I am not a fan of the waistband. I wish the string was shorter and that the waistband has at least a little bit of elasticity to it. The pants are long, which is okay because I can roll them at the top for the appropriate length. The string is far too long and gets tangled in the wash. When wearing them I just shove the strings inside the pants, otherwise they hang way too far down.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect post-surgery lounge pants...
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8” and usually wear a size 8-10. I ordered an XXL to wear after I had surgery. I ordered a bigger size on purpose because I didn’t want anything tight around my waist. They’ve been perfect lounge pants to wear as I recover. I just ordered two more designs, but a smaller size! They’re thin, cozy & cute! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: TXmom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Fine but a little small, my mother and law bought me these pants but the floral design and I loved them so much I wanted another pair. What I loves about them was they were really long and loose so I bought the same size and that is definitely not what I got this time, short and small which is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flowing Good Pri ts
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these pants! She loves the comfortable fit at the waste. She loves that they flow with her and around her. She loves that they are NOT skin-tight spandex. She continues to have me buy more of them. She is tall, but the length in an XL is just right for her (5' 8" and 160 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: John M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Extra LONG!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pants. The mater wasn't quite as soft as I expected but it is very smooth. They are very long and sit high on the waste. They don't seem to stretch out as you wear them. I like low wasted pants so I roll the waste down on these. It's not perfect but it's great for lounging.
customer_reviews.author: Zapped

customer_reviews.title: Too Long for Small People
customer_reviews.text: These pants were way too long on me. I am 5’2”, 110lbs and these covered all of my feet when I stood up. They were just way too long. The waist fit okay, I had to use the drawstrings to make them a more comfortable fit but that wasn’t a big deal for me. The fabric was also cheaper than I was anticipating. If they had fit I probably would have kept them but I wasn’t as happy with them as I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Great Jammy Bottoms!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo soft and comfy! I love the extra long legs to keep my feet warm as I curl up on the couch. And the waist band is non binding, so that is an extra bonus. I like my jammies semi loose fitting so ordered a large. I have a muscular waist and curvy hips and these draped nicely without sliding down. I am 5'2 and 113 lbs. I liked these so much I ordered a second pair 😀
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Love these especially for someone tall
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9” and have a hard time finding pants long enough for me. Love the length of these. They come down to the floor without dragging too much or being too short. The material is really soft and almost satin like. Very lightweight for summer and comfy. I already bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lueck

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT LOUNGING PANTS
customer_reviews.text: THESE PANTS ARE EVERYTHING! They feel amazing as they're super soft and they will not make you hot. Color is slightly off, I was expecting more of a black and white, but I cannot wait to wear them. Im 29, childless and no belly, but these are the perfect pants to chill in at home.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Big but comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and completely comfortable but very very big.. I read others reviews and figured I'd better do what most ppl said and go up 2 sizes. In my case I shouldn't have but they have a drawl string so you can tighten however extremely long and very wide legged. I normal wear a large, ordered XXL.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sansom

customer_reviews.title: Would get something else
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cause of the reviews saying how comfy and soft they were but I personally didn’t think they were all that soft. Felt like basic cotton. You could probably find something more comfy and soft from TJ Maxx for the same price. I washed them before I wore them and the draw string fell out of them already.
customer_reviews.author: JH2

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft which is exactly what I was looking for. They are pretty long which I just am using them as PJ/lounging pants so the length is fine. If they happen to shrink over time, the added length will be ok if that were to happen. I will buy another pair or two to replace some older lounging pants I have.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are really comfortable and fit perfectly. I’m always nervous about length because I’m 5’9” so most are always too short. These aren’t. I ordered the American flag pattern too. I want all of them now lol. To note, I’m 150lb, athletic build and ordered a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Matusiak

customer_reviews.title: Pretty long in length
customer_reviews.text: Runs long. I'm 5'7" and I was still walking on the bottoms of them. I even tried pull them up higher then just waist more to belly button and still walking on them a bit. Thin material but super cute and comfy. I just hemmed the bottoms a little bit. Fit my waist perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara93

customer_reviews.title: I'm ordering another pair to double the FREEDOM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put these pajamas on, and I've never felt more American in my life. The patriot in me comes out, and I run the halls of my apartment complex yelling, "MURICA!!" The neighbors think I'm crazy, but that's because they dont know what it's like to wear these pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: alqsanc

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I like how it fits although I’m expected it to be a little bit longer but is alright because I can walk bare footed the whole house with no problem, I would have given it a 5 star but the material is cheap and the waist is a little too low for me.. other than that is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nashla_peek

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable and wash well
customer_reviews.text: These pant are very soft and comfortable. While they are a bit long, it is most likely because I am 5'2" and I like them enough to not care about the length. I bought these because I had already purchased 3 other pairs so when they came up on a lightning deal I jumped on it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Whelchel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So comfy and true to size. I am 6'1", 200 lbs and the 3x (US 14) was perfect for fit and length! Material is thin, but they're pajamas so it's actually quite comfy and breathable at night!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Powell

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought the smallest adult size for my almost 12 year old because the largest size in children’s fit my 6 year old. The smallest adult size is extremely long and still a bit baggier than I had anticipated. She won’t let me trim them to an appropriate length and she still wears them all the time so I think she likes them as is, but I would have preferred a better fit for her. She wears a 0-3 in junior sizes for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walliser

customer_reviews.title: Soft, run big order a size or two down from your normal sizing
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, wash well. I’m normally a large in pants like these, but a small fit me comfortably with some tightness in the hips/butt which I like. 5’2” 150lbs
customer_reviews.author: D Chip

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a similar pair of PJ bottoms on Amazon in the same size and they were flowy and loose. These were very tight in the thigh area. I bought them to wear as maternity pjs but they definitely will be too tight in the third trimester. Unfortunately, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely long but I cut the bottoms off with scissors, no hemming. After 10+ washes, no fraying and colors are still vibrant. Very comfortable and lightweight. A little see-through on the flag design if you wear dark under..
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am 35 weeks pregnant and bought these for before/after baby. I'm having a repeat C/S and wanted some cuter pants after the initial recovery. These are SO soft/silky, and the fit is perfect. I'm about 190 right now (normally 155-160) and 5'8" and both the length and fit are great. Super flattering too!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: Great for New moms & c-section
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants and needed them after having a c-section. They are comfy and even hide stains because of the pattern and color. I washed and the string came out but I didn’t need to tighten them; they stay on, and are awesome for around the house. Highly recommend for new moms!
customer_reviews.author: MBC

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these when I was pregnant I wish I would have ordered a small. The mediums were too big even with my big ole belly but I do not care these pants are amazingly comfy and I’d recommend them over and over and over. If you need something to get a new mommy or you are a new mommy please do yourself a favor and buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baggy, weird material
customer_reviews.text: Very baggy and gets baggier the longer you wear it. The material is comfortable, but the fit is so baggy, They drag on the floor. The material for the American flag print is somewhat shiny, but dingy and looks cheap. I wore these for 5 months and ended up throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: VC2343

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric, ugly pattern, waist runs small, while legs are loose and large
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, these are extremely thin, the fabric is cheap, the waste size runs small while the legs are large and loose. the print looks cheap as well. honestly I don't think these would last past a few washes. I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stretchy!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! I'm 39 weeks pregnant, and these go over my bump, right above my belly button just as well as most of my maternity tights. And they'll be comfy post partum, and will still fit thanks to the drawstring!! Not too warm, but warmer than you would think pants this thin would be. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Haynes Humphries
